txt.en: 'Are you prepared to accompany me to Mâkhda Khorbo? Let me know when you are ready. I want to be finished with this business.'

'Thank you my friend for all you have done. I cannot imagine what scheme they have put in motion, but they must be stopped whatever it is. There will be hard work ahead of us, but Azagath and Nakási will pay for their betrayal.'
Belondor has asked you to accompany him as he returns to Mâkhda Khorbo in search of clues leading to Azagath and Nakási.

After returning to Mâkhda Khorbo with Belondor, you discovered that Azagath and Nakási took from the temple a map of inland areas east of Umbar. You should talk to Belondor in Dâr Laja, the Meeting-hall.
A Man Adrift, Part 8: Searching the Depths
Talk to Belondor in Umbar-môkh; the Neaths
Belondor is ready to face his fears and return to Mâkhda Khorbo. He has asked you to accompany him.  You should talk to him when you are ready.
'Are you ready [placeholder]? Let us make haste before my courage fails me.'
Talk to Belondor in Dâr Laja
